trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the chupacabra té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 13} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Drain Blood
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one creature that is {@condition enderrocat}, {@condition incapacitat}, o {@condition restrained}. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany necròtic. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13} or its punts de vida màxims is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken, and the chupacabra regains hit points equal to that amount. La reducció dura fins que l'objectiu acabi un Descans Llarg. L'objectiu mor si aquest efecte li redueix els punts de vida màxim a 0.

reaction.name: Pin
entries: If a creature within 5 feet of the chupacabra stands up, the chupacabra can use its reaction to make a bite attack.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the elder dinosaur falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The elder dinosaur té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The elder dinosaur fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

trait.name: Uniqueness
entries: These statistics are shared by all six elder dinosaurs: {@creature Elder Dinosaur (Etali, Primal Storm)|PSX|Etali, Primal Storm}, {@creature Elder Dinosaur (Ghalta, Primal Hunger)|PSX|Ghalta, Primal Hunger}, {@creature Elder Dinosaur (Nezahal, Primal Tide)|PSX|Nezahal, Primal Tide}, {@creature Elder Dinosaur (Tetzimoc, Primal Death)|PSX|Tetzimoc, Primal Death}, {@creature Elder Dinosaur (Zacama, Primal Calamity)|PSX|Zacama, Primal Calamity}, {@creature Elder Dinosaur (Zetalpa, Primal Dawn)|PSX|Zetalpa, Primal Dawn}

action.name: Presència Aterradora
entries: Each creature of the elder dinosaur's choice within 120 feet of it and aware of ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 17} o estar {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. A creature pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, with disadvantage if the elder dinosaur is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself ona success. Si la criatura supera la salvació o l'efecte acaba prematurament, la criatura és immune a elder dinosaur's Presència Aterradora durant les properes 24 hores.

action.name: Empassar
entries: The elder dinosaur makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, that creature takes the bite's damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. Una criatura empassada està {@condition encegat} i {@condition restrained}, té cobertura total contra atacs fora de the elder dinosaur, i rep 56 ({@damage 16d6}) de dany d'àcid a l'inici de cada torn de the elder dinosaur's. If the elder dinosaur takes 60 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 20} at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition enderrocat} in a space within 10 feet of it. If the elder dinosaur dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting {@condition enderrocat}.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The elder dinosaur makes one claw attack, atac de cua, atac ala, or flipper attack.

legendary.name: Moure
entries: The elder dinosaur moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Chomp (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The elder dinosaur makes one bite attack or uses its Swallow.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the elder dinosaur falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The elder dinosaur té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The elder dinosaur fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

trait.name: Lightning Storm
entries: The elder dinosaur is always accompanied by a raging thunderstorm similar to the effect of a {@spell invocar llamps} spell. A storm cloud in the shape of a cylinder that is 10 feet tall with a 60-foot radius instantly forms 100 feet in the air over the elder dinosaur when it is angered or becomes violent, as long as it is outdoors. On each of its turns, com a acció, the elder dinosaur can choose a point it can see within 120 feet of it. A bolt of lightning flashes down from the cloud to that point. Each creature within 10 feet of that point ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 20}. Qui falli rep 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany elèctric; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The elder dinosaur can use its Presència Aterradora and call down two llança de llamps from its Lightning Storm. It then fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}36 ({@damage 4d12 + 10}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 20} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the elder dinosaur can't bite another target.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The elder dinosaur can hold its breath for 4 hours.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The elder dinosaur can use its Presència Aterradora. It then fa cinc atacs: one with its bite and four with its flippers. No two flipper attacks can target the same creature. It can use its Swallow instead of its bite.

trait.name: Spiny Carapace
entries: The elder dinosaur is covered in an armored carapace bristling with thick, sharp spines. Any creature that hits or misses Tetzimoc with a melee attack takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Tail Spike Regrowth
entries: The elder dinosaur has forty tail spikes. Used spikes regrow when the elder dinosaur finishes a long rest.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The elder dinosaur can use its Presència Aterradora. It then fa cinc atacs: one with its bite, two with its claws, one with its horns, and one with its tail. It can use its tail spikes in place of any or all of those attacks, and it can use its Swallow instead of its bite.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The deathspitter fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Spit Poison
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 15/30 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13}. Qui falli rep 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat. A més, a creature that fails its saving throw is {@condition encegat} until the end of the deathspitter's next turn.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Gishath falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Gishath fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its stomp or tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}39 ({@damage 5d12 + 7}) de dany perforant. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 19} or it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 19} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and Gishath can't bite another target.

action.name: Empassar
entries: Gishath makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, that creature takes the bite's damage and is swallowed, and the grapple ends. Una criatura empassada està {@condition encegat} i {@condition restrained}, té cobertura total contra atacs fora de Gishath, i rep 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany d'àcid a l'inici de cada torn de Gishath's.

If Gishath takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 18} at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition enderrocat} in a space within 10 feet of it. If Gishath dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Esclafar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}29 ({@damage 5d8 + 7}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Força amb {@dc 19} o be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) de dany contundent.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Gishath makes one stomp or atac de cua.

legendary.name: Roar (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Each creature that is within 120 feet of Gishath and can hear ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 19} o estar {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. A creature pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on tself on a success. Si una criatura supera la salvada o aquest efecte se li cancel·la, the creature is immune to Gishath's Roar durant les properes 24 hores.

items.name: Multi-atac
entries: The harpy fa dos atacs: one with its claws and one with its bite.

items.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany tallant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució (CD 11). Si falla, contract a disease. Until the disease is cured, the target can't regain hit points except by magical means, and the target's punts de vida màxims decreases by 3 ({@dice 1d6}) every 24 hours. If the target's punts de vida màxims drops to 0 as a result of this disease, the target dies.

monster.name: Sunbird
idiomes: understands Common but can't speak it

trait.name: Acaballes de la Mortalitat
entries: When the sunbird dies, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 18}. Qui falli rep 42 ({@damage 12d6}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat. The explosion ignites flammable objects in that area que ningú estigui portant o vestint. The sunbird's body turns to ash, but an egg is left where the sunbird was.

trait.name: Fire Aura
entries: A l'inici de cada torn de the sunbird, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany de foc, and flammable objects in the area que ningú estigui portant o vestint ignite. A creature that touches the sunbird or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany de foc. The aura also desprèn llum forta en un radi de 60 peus i llum tènue uns 60 peus adicionals.

trait.name: Passar Volant
entries: The sunbird no provoca atacs d'oportunitats quan surt volant de l'abast d'un enemic.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The sunbird has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda o la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The sunbird makes two talon attacks.

action.name: Talon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) de dany tallant mes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de foc, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 18} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the sunbird can't attack another target with that talon. A {@condition grappled} creature takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany de foc at the start of each of the sunbird's turns.
